resources.string: Daily Prayer
اَلْحَمْدُ ِللهِ الَّذِىْ جَعَلَهُ عَذْبًا فُرَاتًا بِرَحْمَتِهِ وَلَمْ يَجْعَلْهُ مِلْحًا اُجَاجًا بِذُنُوْبِنَا
بِسْمِكَ اللّٰهُمَّ اَحْيَا وَاَمُوْتُ
اَللّٰهُمَّ إِنّىِ أَعُوْذُ بِكَ مِنْ عَمَلِ الشَّيْطَانِ وَسَيِّئاَتِ اْلأَحْلاَمِ
اَلْحَمْدُ ِللهِ الَّذِيْ قَطْلَ الْحَاجَتِ
اَلْحَمْدُ ِللهِ الَّذِىْ اَحْيَانَا بَعْدَمَآ اَمَاتَنَا وَاِلَيْهِ النُّشُوْرُ
اَللّٰهُمَّ اِنّىْ اَعُوْذُبِكَ مِنَ الْخُبُثِ وَالْخَبَآئِثِ
اَللّٰهُمَّ طَهِّرُ قَلْبِىْ مِنَ النِّفَاقِ وَحَصِّنْ فَرْخِىْ مِنَ الْفَوَاحِشِ
غُفْرَانَكَ الْحَمْدُ ِللهِ الَّذِىْ اَذْهَبَ عَنّى اْلاَذَى وَعَافَانِىْ
اَللّٰهُمَّ بِكَ اَصْبَحْنَا وَبِكَ اَمْسَيْنَا وَبِكَ نَحْيَا وَبِكَ نَمُوْتُ وَاِلَيْكَ النُّشُوْرُ
اَللّٰهُمَّ بِكَ اَمْسَيْنَا وَبِكَ اَصْبَحْنَا وَبِكَ نَحْيَا وَبِكَ نَمُوْتُ وَاِلَيْكَ الْمَصِيْرُ
اَلْحَمْدُ ِللهِ كَمَا حَسَّنْتَ خَلْقِىْ فَحَسِّـنْ خُلُقِىْ
اَللّٰهُمَّ اِنّىْ اَسْأَلُكَ خَيْرَالْمَوْلِجِ وَخَيْرَالْمَخْرَجِ بِسْمِ اللهِ وَلَجْنَا وَبِسْمِ اللهِ خَرَجْنَا وَعَلَى اللهِ رَبّنَا تَوَكَّلْنَا
بِسْمِ اللهِ تَوَكَّلْتُ عَلَى اللهِ لاَحَوْلَ وَلاَقُوَّةَ اِلاَّ بِالله
بِسْمِ اللهِ اَللّٰهُمَّ اِنِّى اَسْأَلُكَ مِنْ خَيْرِهِ وَخَيْرِ مَاهُوَ لَهُ وَاَعُوْذُبِكَ مِنْ شَرِّهِ وَشَرِّمَا هُوَلَهُ
اَلْحَمْدُ لِلّٰهِ الَّذِىْ كَسَانِىْ هَذَا وَرَزَقَنِيْهِ مِنْ غَيْرِ حَوْلٍ مِنِّىْ وَلاَقُوَّةٍ
بِسْمِ اللهِ الَّذِيْ لاَ إِلَهَ إِلَّا هُوَ
اَللّٰهُمَّ اِنِّى اَسْأَلُكَ عِلْمًا نَافِعًا وَرِزْقًا طَيِّبًا وَعَمَلاً مُتَقَبَّلاً
يَارَبِّ زِدْنِىْ عِلْمًا وَارْزُقْنِىْ فَهْمًا
اَللّٰهُمَّ اِنِّى اِسْتَوْدِعُكَ مَاعَلَّمْتَنِيْهِ فَارْدُدْهُ اِلَىَّ عِنْدَ حَاجَتِىْ وَلاَ تَنْسَنِيْهِ يَارَبَّ الْعَالَمِيْنَ
اَللّٰهُمَّ هَوِّنْ عَلَيْنَا سَفَرَنَا هَذَا وَاطْوِعَنَّابُعْدَهُ اَللّٰهُمَّ اَنْتَ الصَّاحِبُ فِى السَّفَرِوَالْخَلِيْفَةُفِى الْاَهْلِ
سُبْحَانَ الَّذِىْ سَخَّرَلَنَا هَذَا وَمَاكُنَّالَهُ مُقْرِنِيْنَ وَاِنَّآ اِلَى رَبِّنَا لَمُنْقَلِبُوْنَ
بِسْمِ اللهِ مَجْرَهَا وَمُرْسَهَآاِنَّ رَبِّىْ لَغَفُوْرٌرَّحِيْمٌ
اَلْحَمْدُ ِللهِ الَّذِى سَلَمَنِى وَالَّذِى اَوَنِى وَالَّذِى جَمَعَ الشَّمْلَ بِ
اَللّٰهُمَّ افْتَحْ لِيْ اَبْوَابَ رَحْمَتِكَ
نَوَيْتُ الْوُضُوْءَ لِرَفْعِ الْحَدَثِ اْلاَصْغَرِ فَرْضًا لِلّٰهِ تَعَالَى
" where to send ?"
Meaning: O God, bless us in the provision which You have given us and save us from the punishment of the fire of hell
Meaning: Praise be to Allah who has fed us and our drinks, and made us Muslims
Meaning: Praise be to Allah who has made this water (drink) fresh and energized by His grace and does not make this water (drink) salty again bitter because of our sins
Meaning: By calling Your name O God, I live and I die
Meaning: O Allah, verily I seek Your protection from the devil\'s actions and from bad dreams
Meaning: Praise be to Allah who gave me my intentions
Meaning: Praise be to God who raised us after we died (awakened from sleep) and only to Him we are returned
Meaning: O Allah, I take refuge in You from the temptation of male and female shaytan
Meaning: O my Lord, purify my heart from the nature of pretense (munafiq) and keep my hell out of evil deeds
Meaning: By wishing Your forgiveness, all praise belongs to Allah who has removed the impurity of my body and which has prospered
Meaning: O God, for You we experience morning and evening, and because of You we live and die and to You also we will return
Meaning: O God, for You we have the evening and the morning, for You are alive and dead and to you also we shall return
Meaning: Praise be to Allah, make good to my master as You have made my face looks

Meaning: O Allah, verily I plead with you the good place of entry and the good of the place of exit by mentioning the name of Allah we enter, and by calling the name of our God out and to Allah our Lord we put our trust
Meaning: In the name of Allah I put my trust in Allah, no power but by God\'s law
Meaning: In Your name, O God I ask You for the good of this garment and the goodness that is in it, and I seek Your protection from the wickedness of this garment and the evil that is in it
Meaning: Praise be to Allah who gave me this garment and gave rizki with no effort and strength from me
Meaning: In the name of Allah without God except him
Meaning: O Allah, verily I appeal to You useful science, good provision and good deeds Accepted (H.R. Ibn Majah)
Meaning: O Allah, add me knowledge and give me rizqi for understanding
Meaning: O Allah, verily I entrust to You the sciences that You have taught me, and return it to me when I need to return and do not you forget me to that science O Lord exciting all nature
It means: O Allah, make it easy for us to travel, and bring near the distance O God who accompanies in traveling, and You also protect the family
Meaning: The most holy of Allah who has subjected to us (the vehicle) before we were unable to master it, and only to You is we will return
Meaning: In the name of Allah who runs this vehicle sails and docks, verily my Lord is indeed the Forgiving, the Most Merciful
Meaning: Praise be to Allah, who has saved me and who has protected me and who gathered me with my family
Meaning: O God, open for me the doors of Your mercy
Meaning: I am intending to perform ablution to remove the small hadast fardhu (obligatory) because Allah taala
PRAYER WHEN MERCY
WAKE UP
share
PRAYER BEFORE EATING
ISTINJA
SIGN TOILET
TOILET OUT
DAILY PRAYER
INFO
rate
ENTER TO HOME
WHEN A NIGHTMARE
WHEN GOOD DREAMS
MORNING
BEFORE SLEEPING
AFTER EAT
AFTER DRINKING
AFTERNOON
OUT OF THE HOUSE
WHEN CLOTHING
NEW CLOTHES
REMOVING CLOTHES
HIGHLY BENEFITED SCIENCE
BEFORE LEARNING
AFTER STUDY
WILL BE TRAVELING
RIDE VEHICLE
WHEN SHIP OFF
ARRIVE AT DESTINATION
ENTERED INTO MOSQUE
WUDHU

This application is made so that we can practice daily prayer 

Acknowledgments to Lecturer and to class IT B Hamzanwadi University

اَللَّهُمَّ بَارِكْ لَنَا فِيْمَا رَزَقْتَنَا وَقِنَا عَذَابَ النَّارِ
اَلْحَمْدُ ِللهِ الَّذِىْ اَطْعَمَنَا وَسَقَانَا وَجَعَلَنَا مُسْلِمِيْنَ
